effects.effect: You have the following performance ability, which is usable with your Routines feature.

features.name: Take Two!
features.flavor: One more, and this time make it interesting.
features.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While this performance is active, each target who starts their turn in the area can reroll the first power roll that turn that obtains a tier 2 outcome. They must use the new roll.
